attributes.action: Form an elected independent committee from the general public to oversee MPs pay and expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hereby petition the Prime Minister to form an elected body taken from the GENERAL PUBLIC (similar to a legal jury) to oversee all matters concerning MPs pay and expenses.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
